name: Exteria
description: Exteria is an old school fantasy first person shooter. Play through the short story and fight for a highscore in survival mode!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 7/Vista (32-64 bit) Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD Athlon II X4 645 or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 8800 GT or ATI Radeon HD 4700 or better DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 –compliant sound card

reviews.review_text: Got all the achievements, feelsgoodman.  My ratings: Voice-overs: 8/10 Module textures: 7/10 Module animations: 5/10 Animations: 3.5/10 Terrain textures: 2/10  Needs an Option button, to control music and overall volume.
